GSP33yamss_pu:459: iti saṃvidvivartatvaṃ prapañcaḥ sphuṭam añcati // YSsi_200 //
GSP33yamss_pu:464: tathā hīdam ahaṃ vedmīty anyonyānātmanā sphuṭam /
GSP33yamss_pu:465: trayaṃ sākṣāc cakāstīti sarveṣām atmasākṣikam // YSsi_202 //
GSP33yamss_pu:467: na hi vahner anuṣṇatvaṃ dravyatvād anumīyate // YSsi_203 //
GSP33yamss_pu:468: kiñ ca hetur viruddho 'yaṃ sahabhāvo dvayor yataḥ /
GSP33yamss_pu:469: tavāpi na hi saṃvitiḥ svātmanā saha bhāsate // YSsi_204 //
GSP33yamss_pu:473: tena saṃvedanaṃ satyaṃ aṃvedyo 'rthas tv asann iti // YSsi_205 //
GSP33yamss_pu:478: ghaṭād ṛte 'pi nirbhātaḥ paṭād iva ghaṭaḥ svayam // YSsi_207 //
